description:
This is my face.

This is what my children see everyday.

They see it smile, they see it frown, they see it laugh and cry.

Do you know what they'll never see?

Half of it obscured by a mask. 

They'll never see their mother walk around looking like she's an extra in The Purge and limiting her own oxygen supply just so she can make the brainwashed masses feel safer. 

#IDoNotConsent

Thankyou @benmitchellsong for the inspiration for this post.
